verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: will] be on Capitol Hill Tuesday to meet with Republicans on possible immigration bills .
[ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: be] [ARG2: on Capitol Hill] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARGM-PRP: to meet with Republicans on possible immigration bills] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] will be on Capitol Hill Tuesday to [V: meet] [ARG1: with Republicans on possible immigration bills] .
